data.title: Nice Staff...Average Food!
data.text: I only ate here one night.  Underdone chicken and over-salted food.  Despite being very hungry with no other food options open in the area, I took 2 bites and had to throw it away.  Nice staff though, but that's where it ended.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: Our waitress, Nicole was absolutely wonderful.  She checked on us every ten to fifteen minutes, making sure nothing was wrong or needed.  Food was spot on and a great value for the price

data.title: A great experience!
data.text: Nicole and the rest of the staff there are FANTASTIC! They make you feel welcome and always have a smile on their faces. I have eaten there numerous times and never had a bad meal. Their Utica greens are some of the best you will find in the area. I treat myself to them every time I am there as I cannot get them at home. Their burgers are great and their sandwiches are pretty good too. Stop by if you are in the area, you will not be disappointed.

data.title: Convenient Dinner in the hotel
data.text: Dropped in for dinner inside the hotel.   The food was good and reasonable.  The wait staff was friendly and attentive to our needs.   I would definitely stay here again for a short visit.

data.title: After Party
data.text: After a wedding reception we went to the Encore for an after party.  The staff was friendly and provided very good service to a large wedding party.

data.title: Great lunch menu and friendly staff !!
data.text: While exploring the hotel for a future visit my family and I stopped into the Encore Lounge for lunch. We were greeted by a very friendly server, Michelle, and were promptly seated along with a high chair for my 3 year old. The menu was pretty extensive and included all the usual "tavern type foods", burgers, sandwiches, soups, salads and a few entrees also. We tried the sandwiches and soup. The Rueben I ordered was very good and served with pub fries. The fries had a garlic type coating similar to garlic parmesan wings, and were very flavorful. Due to the kitchen having problems with their tomato bisque soup, I had the French onion soup. It was served in the classic bowl with a generous coating of cheese and a huge piece of bread under it. The soup tasted great and was served promptly. Michelle kept checking on us and keeping our drinks filled and my 3 year old entertained which was very much appreciated :)
